name: swagger-markdown
description: Create markdown API documentation from swagger file

scripts.examples: node ./bin/index.js -i examples/basic-auth.yaml && node ./bin/index.js -i examples/default.yaml && node ./bin/index.js -i examples/echo.yaml && node ./bin/index.js -i examples/heroku-pets.yaml && node ./bin/index.js -i examples/instagram.yaml && node ./bin/index.js -i examples/minimal.yaml && node ./bin/index.js -i examples/petstore_full.yaml && node ./bin/index.js -i examples/petstore_simple.yaml && node ./bin/index.js -i examples/security.yaml

author: Sergii Skorokhodov
